Package org.hypergraphdb.viewer.painter

Interface Summary
EdgePainter The interface responsible for applying visual stuff to a EdgeView (visual representation of the FEdge).
NodePainter The interface responsible for applying visual stuff to a NodeView (visual representation of the FNode).
PaintEdgeInfo This interface describes all visual properties used for drawing an edge
PaintNodeInfo This interface describes all visual properties used for drawing a node
 

Class Summary
DefaultEdgePainter Default implementation of the EdgePainter and PaintEdgeInfo interfaces
DefaultEdgePainterBeanInfo EdgePainter's BeanInfo used in properties editor
DefaultNodePainter Default implementation of the NodePainter and PaintNodeInfo interfaces
DefaultNodePainterBeanInfo NodePainter's BeanInfo used in properties editor
Shape This class is a replacement for the yFiles Shape class.
SimpleLabelTooltipNodePainter Simple node painter that displays the full String representation of the node's underlying object as tooltip and a shortened one as node's Label
TestPainterProps Testing class to be removed
